thread.title: BRIEF-Piper Jaffray Forms Middle-Market Debt Underwriting Vehicle

title: BRIEF-Piper Jaffray Forms Middle-Market Debt Underwriting Vehicle

organizations.name: brief-piper jaffray forms middle-market debt un
piper jaffray & co capital advisory group

text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Piper Jaffray Companies:
* PIPER JAFFRAY COMPANIES FORMS MIDDLE-MARKET DEBT UNDERWRITING VEHICLE WITH $1.0 BILLION OF EQUITY COMMITMENTS
* PIPER JAFFRAY COMPANIES - PIPER JAFFRAY FINANCE LLC WILL UNDERWRITE DEBT FACILITIES FOR SPONSORED AND NON-SPONSORED MIDDLE-MARKET COMPANIES
* PIPER JAFFRAY COMPANIES - LEN SHEER , HEAD OF PIPER JAFFRAY & CO CAPITAL ADVISORY GROUP, WILL SERVE AS PRESIDENT OF PIPER JAFFRAY FINANCE LLC Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
